SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.builder

Class HouseBuilder

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.builder.HouseBuilder
public class HouseBuilder extends Object
Builder class for constructing House objects using the Builder design pattern. This class provides a fluent interface (method chaining) and maintains contextual state (the currently active room) to simplify the setup of the house structure and its contents. [Image of the Builder design pattern diagram]

  • Constructor Details

    • HouseBuilder

      public HouseBuilder(String name, String location)
      Constructs a new HouseBuilder, initializing the underlying House object. The builder starts with no active room.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the house.
      location - The geographical location of the house.

  • Method Details

    • addRoom

      public HouseBuilder addRoom(Room room)
      Adds a new Room to the house and sets it as the current active room. All subsequent item additions (equipment, members, etc.) will be placed in this room until a new room is added or the house is built.
      Parameters:
      room - The room to add.
      Returns:
      The current builder instance for method chaining.

    • addSportsEquipment

      public HouseBuilder addSportsEquipment(SportsEquipment equipment)
      Adds SportsEquipment to the currently active room.
      Parameters:
      equipment - The sports equipment to add.
      Returns:
      The current builder instance for method chaining.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if addRoom() has not been called first.

    • addMember

      public HouseBuilder addMember(HouseHoldMember member)
      Adds a HouseHoldMember to the currently active room and links them to the house.
      Parameters:
      member - The household member to add.
      Returns:
      The current builder instance for method chaining.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if addRoom() has not been called first.

    • addAppliance

      public HouseBuilder addAppliance(Appliance appliance)
      Adds an Appliance to the currently active room.
      Parameters:
      appliance - The appliance to add.
      Returns:
      The current builder instance for method chaining.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if addRoom() has not been called first.

    • addSensor

      public HouseBuilder addSensor(Sensor sensor)
      Adds a Sensor to the currently active room.
      Parameters:
      sensor - The sensor to add.
      Returns:
      The current builder instance for method chaining.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if addRoom() has not been called first.

    • build

      public House build()
      Finalizes the construction and returns the fully configured House object.
      Returns:
      The built House instance.
